root.name: Extreme Sports with the Berenstain Bears
root.description: OverviewExtreme Sports With the Berenstain Bears is an extreme sports game developed by Ed Magnin and Associates and published by Sound Source for the Game Boy Color platform.GameplayThe game was made up of six separate sports games that included:sleddingdirt bikingfreestyle kayakingdirt boardingtobogganingrafting competitionsReceptionThe game was received very poorly, garnering a spot on the 20 worst games of all time according to an article from Electronic Gaming Monthly.
